___utils_content_element_json.description: An item that conforms to this schema can be rendered in a sequence
___utils_content_element_json.title: An element that can be listed as part of content elements

trait_additional_properties_json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
trait_additional_properties_json.title: Has additional properties

trait_alignment_json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
trait_alignment_json.title: Alignment

trait_channel_json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
trait_channel_json.title: Channel trait

trait_focal_point_json.description: Coordinates representing the 'visual center' of an image. The X axis is horizontal line and the Y axis the vertical line, with 0,0 being the LEFT, TOP of the image.

x.description: The coordinate point on the horizontal axis

y.description: The coordinate point on the vertical axis

trait_focal_point_json.title: Focal Point

trait_gallery_properties_json.description: An object for overrides for images when images are used in a gallery. Example usage: Each image in a gallery may have the images own focal point overridden by the gallery.
trait_gallery_properties_json.title: Has gallery properties

trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

trait_subtype_json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
trait_subtype_json.title: Subtype or Template

description: Holds attributes of an ANS collection - a common parent to story and gallery objects.
title: A collection of content.
